archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1322
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to learn more about interest free payment options, so that I can decide if it is right for me.

properties.value: Where these information should be available for customer? Is it about to choose between Credit Card/Direct Debit or is it some text from CMS? DX Diane: This is more for web/app, information pages to assist with customer decision making. Assume the same content should be available for customers talking/chatting to an agent.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
